health.good: Air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
health.moderate: Air quality is acceptable. However, there may be a risk for some people, particularly those who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
health.unhealthySensitive: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is less likely to be affected.
health.unhealthy: Some members of the general public may experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious effects.
health.veryUnhealthy: Health alert: The risk of health effects is increased for everyone.
health.hazardous: Health warning of emergency conditions: everyone is more likely to be affected.
